page.title: 14A LOCAL ARTIST IN BURWELL.
page.content: {Peter Welch}is a well known{artist}in the village.He has his own studio at home.He usually travels around getting bark and foliage as subjects.He has a machine in which he puts slides to draw from. He wasn't very artistic when he was young.He started to paint when he was about 11 and he first sold pictures in about 1970.He sells his pictures for roughly Â£80,painting a big picture in about 1-2 weeks.He does about 30 pictures a year. He paints mostly birds, sometimes for the{RSPB calender.}At the moment he is doing a tawny owl.He uses sanded down hardboard.He also paints on canvas with oils etc.He has taught people to paint and also displayed work internationally.
